description.brazilian: Isso sim é sexo sem compromisso.
description.english: That's why they call it a one night stand.
description.french: C’est pour cela qu’ils appellent ça un coup d’un soir.
description.german: Deswegen wird es ein One Night Stand genannt.
description.italian: Come si dice, una botta e via.
description.russian: Потому это и называется "свиданием на одну ночь".
description.schinese: 这就是为什么大家称之为一夜情。

displayName.brazilian: Cada um para o seu lado

description.brazilian: Você foi rejeitado.
description.english: You got rejected.
description.french: Vous avez été rejeté.
description.german: Du wurdest abgewiesen.
description.italian: Sei stato rifiutato.

description.brazilian: Vocês ficaram amigos.
description.english: You became friends.
description.french: Vous êtes devenus amis.
description.german: Ihr seid Freunde geworden.
description.italian: Siete diventati amici.

description.brazilian: A honestidade é mesmo a melhor política
description.english: Honesty really is the best policy.
description.french: L’honnêteté est la meilleure des manières.
description.german: Ehrlichkeit ist die beste Taktik.
description.italian: L'onestà è la carta vincente.

description.brazilian: Você escapou na primeira oportunidade, vestido.
description.english: Escaped quickly and clothed.
description.french: Partir rapidement et habillé.
description.german: Du bist schnell und bekleidet entkommen.
description.italian: Te ne sei andato in fretta e vestito.

description.brazilian: Você escapou quando ela precisava de você.
description.english: Escaped during her moment of need.
description.french: Partir quand elle a besoin de vous.
description.german: Du bist im Moment ihrer Not entkommen.
description.italian: Te ne sei andato nel momento del bisogno.
description.russian: Вы ушли, когда ей, возможно, нужна была помощь.

description.brazilian: Você falhou no último minuto.
description.english: You failed at the last hurdle.
description.french: Vous avez échoué au dernier obstacle.
description.german: Du bist an der letzten Hürde gescheitert.
description.italian: Hai fallito all'ultimo ostacolo.

description.brazilian: Você foi pego usando a calcinha dela.
description.english: You got caught wearing her underwear.
description.french: Elle vous a vu porter sa culotte.
description.german: Du wurdest erwischt, während du ihre Unterwäsche trägst.
description.italian: Sei stato scoperto con indosso la sua biancheria intima.
description.russian: Вы надели ее белье — и попались.
description.schinese: 你被发现穿了她的内裤。

description.brazilian: Quem compartilha nem sempre se importa.
description.english: Sharing isn't caring.
description.french: Partager n’est pas aimer.
description.german: Teilend ist nicht sorgend.
description.italian: Il lato oscuro della condivisione.

description.brazilian: Você foi mandado embora.
description.english: You got thrown out.
description.french: Vous avez été expulsé.
description.german: Du wurdest rausgeworfen.
description.italian: Sei stato buttato fuori.

description.brazilian: Você saiu pelado sem ligar para as consequências.
description.english: You made a break for it.
description.french: Tel un voleur, vous avez disparu dans l’ombre.
description.german: Du bist abgehauen.
description.italian: Te la sei data a gambe, ma a che costo?
description.russian: Вы вырвались на свободу, но какой ценой?

description.brazilian: Ela tocou a guitarra para você.
description.english: She picked up her six-string.
description.french: Elle a joué de sa guitare.
description.german: Sie hat ihre sechs Saiten aufgehoben.
description.italian: Ha suonato la sua chitarra.

displayName.french: Une vraie marche de la honte!

description.brazilian: Você foi expulso sem as suas roupas.
description.english: You got thrown out without your clothes.
description.french: Vous vous êtes fait expulser dehors sans vos vêtements.
description.german: Du wurdest ohne deine Klamotten rausgeworfen.
description.italian: Sei stato cacciato fuori nudo.
description.russian: Вас вышвырнули на улицу без одежды.
description.schinese: 你被一丝不挂地扔出去了。

displayName.english: At least you can dress yourself
displayName.french: Au moins, vous pouvez vous habiller.
displayName.german: Immerhin kannst du dich selber anziehen
displayName.italian: Se non altro, ti sei vestito

description.brazilian: Você foi expulso, mas ao menos vestiu as suas roupas.
description.english: You got thrown out with your clothes on.
description.french: Vous vous êtes fait expulser tout habillé.
description.german: Du wurdest mit deinen Klamotten rausgeworfen.
description.italian: Sei stato cacciato fuori vestito.
description.russian: Вас вышвырнули на улицу, но вы успели одеться.
description.schinese: 你穿好衣服后被扔出去了。

description.brazilian: Você conseguiu roubar uma calcinha dela.
description.english: You successfully stole a pair of her panties.
description.french: Vous avez réussi a lui voler sa culotte.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich ein Paar ihrer Höschen geklaut.
description.italian: Sei riuscito a rubare un suo paio di mutandine.
description.russian: Вам удалось украсть на память ее трусики.
description.schinese: 你成功偷到了她的内裤。

description.brazilian: Às vezes é melhor verificar as evidências…
description.english: You might want to double check the evidence...
description.french: Il faudrait peut-être regarder les preuves une seconde fois…
description.german: Du solltest den Verdacht zweimal überprüfen…
description.italian: Dovresti controllare meglio tutti gli indizi…
description.schinese: 也许你想再检查一下线索…

displayName.english: A rose by any other name
displayName.german: Eine Rose mit einem anderen Namen
displayName.italian: Una rosa, pur con un altro nome…

description.brazilian: Você escolheu não acreditar em nenhum dos nomes dela.
description.english: You chose not to believe anything.
description.french: Vous avez choisi de ne rien croire.
description.german: Du entscheidest, dich auf nichts zu verlassen.
description.italian: Hai deciso di non credere a nulla.

description.brazilian: Você pediu um café caprichado.
description.english: Order a fancy coffee.
description.french: Vous avez demandé un café fort différent.
description.german: Bestell einen ausgefallenen Kaffee.
description.italian: Ordina un caffè speciale.

description.brazilian: Acuse-a de drogar você.
description.english: Accuse her of drugging you.
description.french: Accusez-la de vous avoir drogué.
description.german: Beschuldige sie, dir Drogen gegeben zu haben.
description.italian: Accusala di averti drogato.
description.russian: Вы готовы обвинить ее в том, что она вас отравила.

description.brazilian: Você virou fã do "Love IRL".
description.english: You became a fan of Love IRL.
description.french: Vous êtes devenu un fan de Love IRL.
description.german: Du bist ein Fan von Love IRL geworden.
description.italian: Sei diventato un fan di Love IRL.

description.brazilian: Vocês têm o mesmo nome.
description.english: Turns out you share the same name!
description.french: Vous avez le même nom!
description.german: Es stellt sich heraus, dass ihr denselben Namen habt!
description.italian: A quanto pare, avete lo stesso nome!

description.brazilian: Você disse o último nome que ela gostaria de ouvir.
description.english: You told her the last name that she wanted to hear.
description.french: Vous lui avez dit le seul nom qu’elle ne voulait pas entendre.
description.german: Du hast ihr den letzten Namen gesagt, den sie hören wollte.
description.italian: Le hai detto il nome che non voleva sentire.
description.russian: Вы произносите имя, которое ей меньше всего хочется слышать.
description.schinese: 你说出了她之前期盼的名字。

description.brazilian: Não há nada demais em um nome.
description.english: What’s in a name anyway?
description.french: Quelle est l’utilité d’un nom de toute façon?
description.german: Was bedeutet ein Name schon?
description.italian: Che importanza ha un nome?

description.brazilian: Você preferiu ficar calado sempre que possível.
description.english: You choose to remain silent whenever possible.
description.french: Vous avez décidé de rester silencieux à chaque fois que vous en avez eu l’occasion.
description.german: Du entscheidest dich zu schweigen wannimmer möglich.
description.italian: Hai deciso di restare in silenzio ogni volta che hai potuto.
description.schinese: 你在可以选择的时候都保持沉默。

description.brazilian: Você investigou todos os itens do jogo.
description.english: You investigated every item in the game.
description.french: Vous avez inspecté tous les objets du jeu.
description.german: Du hast jedes Item im Spiel untersucht.
description.italian: Hai esaminato tutti gli oggetti nel gioco.
description.schinese: 你检查了游戏里所有的物品。

description.brazilian: Você recebeu outra mensagem do Enzo.
description.english: You receive another message from Gary.
description.french: Vous avez reçu un autre message de Gary.
description.german: Du erhältst eine weitere Nachricht von Gary.
description.italian: Hai ricevuto un altro messaggio da Gary.
description.russian: Вы получаете еще одно сообщение от Макса.
description.schinese: 你收到了盖瑞的另一条短信。

description.brazilian: Vocês concordaram a respeito do livro, das anotações dela e do "Love IRL".
description.english: You both felt the same way about the book, her writing and Love IRL.
description.french: Vous avez le même avis qu’elle sur le livre, son roman et Love IRL.
description.german: Ihr habt beide dieselbe Meinung über das Buch, ihre Geschichte und Love IRL.
description.italian: La pensate allo stesso modo sul libro, la sua scrittura e Love IRL.
description.russian: Вы одинаково относитесь к роману, ее писательскому эксперименту и фильму "Любовь в реале".
description.schinese: 你们对书、她的小说和Love IRL的想法一样。
